title: Can't reply due on forums
body: Says I need to be level 7 but in game I'm level 30.  Is there another way to level on the forums so I can reply to comments

replies.body: Sometimes the levels of your board's account and client Summoner level can take a bit to sync up with each other. After you posted here, it forced those to link up, so you're showing up as level 30 now ^_^!
